r - Static variable in class metro.Graphics.Fill
 
RailwayNode - Class in metro.TrainManagement.Nodes
A railway node is a point that's used by train lines and every node has neighbors (both know each other).
RailwayNode(Point, RailwayNode) - Constructor for class metro.TrainManagement.Nodes.RailwayNode
Creates a new node at the given position with a specific neighbor.
RailwayNode(Point, ArrayList<RailwayNode>) - Constructor for class metro.TrainManagement.Nodes.RailwayNode
Creates a new node at the given position with some specified neighbors.
RailwayNodeOverseer - Class in metro.TrainManagement.Nodes
This class manages the RailwayNodes, offers some functions in adding, removing and clearing the map of nodes.
RailwayNodeOverseer() - Constructor for class metro.TrainManagement.Nodes.RailwayNodeOverseer
